task.title: Run the reference implementation application
task.shortdesc: After building the project from IntelliJ, you can either run the project through your browser or from within IntelliJ.

step.cmd: To run the project through your browser, navigate your browser to http://www.yourhost.com/pt-reference/ReferencePlayer/ReferencePlayer.html, where www.yourhost.com is your domain.
To run the project from within IntelliJ, you need to create a Run Configuration.

substep.cmd: From IntelliJ, select RunRun... from the top menu.
Click the green + in the upper left corner.

ul.li: URL or local file: http://www.yourhost.com/pt-reference/ReferencePlayer/ReferencePlayer.html, where www.yourhost.com is your domain. Is this path correct with pt-reference? I changed it to match the path in the first bullet, above, but this one was not correct and was slightly different (ptreference-desktop).
Launch with: you must select a browser, so either leave as system default application or select a browser. You cannot run from a standalone Flash Player directly (FlashPlayerDebugger.exe).

substep.info: When the player loads in the browser, the Media resource selection panel is displayed on the right hand side.

substep.cmd: From the Media resource select panel, click Load to load the default media catalog.
Select any of the listed entries to start video playback.
